channel.title: Add autoupdate or update command
channel.description:
From @Anthony on https://github.com/mesg-foundation/core/issues/152
It could be nice to have an auto update feature that download the last CLI and the last docker image and install it automatically. This can either be full automatic and checked every time the CLI runs or can be a `mesg-core update` command
